name: Educreations
headline: Create amazing video lessons and online classes with an iPad.
description: Educreations is a community where anyone can teach what they know and learn what they don't.  Our software turns any iPad or web browser into a recordable, interactive whiteboard, making it easy for teachers and experts to create engaging video lessons and share them on the web.  Students can replay these lessons any time, any place, on any connected device.  We're on a mission to dramatically improve student achievement by extending the reach of great teaching.
markdown:
raw_markdown="[![Educreations](https://www.educreations.com/static/focuslab/images/logo_image_comp.c84b9ca3ed46.svg)![Educreations](https://www.educreations.com/static/focuslab/images/logo_text_comp.cf265fc11d55.svg)](https://www.educreations.com/</>)![Open Navigation](https://www.educreations.com/static/focuslab/images/icon_nav_blue_comp.3e9917aa3561.svg)

# Teach anything to anyone from anywhere.
[Teacher Sign Up](https://www.educreations.com/</register/?page=teacher>)[Student Sign Up](https://www.educreations.com/</register/?page=chooser>)[![Download on the App Store](https://www.educreations.com/static/images/common/app-store-badge.d0558d910630.svg)](https://www.educreations.com/<http:/apps.apple.com/app/educreations/id478617061?mt=8&pt=665186&ct=about>)
# Engage Students With Video
  * ![Capture Your Ideas](https://www.educreations.com/static/focuslab/images/feature_graphic_1.f81f806f8ff8.svg)
## Capture Your Ideas
Record your voice and iPad® screen to create dynamic video lessons that students and colleagues can access any time, as needed.
  * ![Share Instantly](https://www.educreations.com/static/focuslab/images/feature_graphic_2.894540bcbbd4.svg)
## Share Instantly
Post your videos to Educreations and share them with anyone. You can even share videos via email, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, or download and store them in Dropbox or Google Drive.
  * ![Replay Anytime](https://www.educreations.com/static/focuslab/images/feature_graphic_3.94aec8b49f5c.svg)
## Replay Anytime
All of your videos are stored safely in the cloud and are accessible everywhere you need them. You control who can see what.


  * ![Testimonial Image](https://www.educreations.com/static/focuslab/images/bkg_testimonial_1.df923aa9ba8c.jpg)Paul GrovesHigh School Chemistry Teacher
> The simplicity of Educreations is what appeals to me. Creating my lessons is about what I want to convey rather than how to make it work.
![](https://www.educreations.com/static/focuslab/images/profile_photo_paul.292442358a72.jpg) Paul GrovesHigh School Chemistry Teacher
  * ![Testimonial Image](https://www.educreations.com/static/focuslab/images/bkg_testimonial_2.73c008ee2f06.jpg)Bonnie Odd6th-7th Grade Math Teacher
> Parents can see exactly how I explained a concept so that they can build on that and help their children with homework.
![](https://www.educreations.com/static/focuslab/images/profile_photo_bonnie.6377c23863cc.jpg) Bonnie Odd7th Grade Math Teacher
  * ![Testimonial Image](https://www.educreations.com/static/focuslab/images/bkg_testimonial_3.4f581ed2c48a.jpg)Dave YoungHigh School Spanish Teacher
> Educreations allows students to access and explore language on their own terms and in their own time. My students love the videos, and are always asking for more.
![](https://www.educreations.com/static/focuslab/images/profile_photo_dave.8f012b6fb542.jpg) Dave YoungHigh School Spanish Teacher
  * ![Testimonial Image](https://www.educreations.com/static/focuslab/images/bkg_testimonial_4.034d8aa6cff0.jpg)Diedre DowningHigh School Math Teacher
> Educreations has allowed me the flexibility to meet all of my students needs, both in and out of the classroom. It has transformed my teaching.
![](https://www.educreations.com/static/focuslab/images/profile_photo_diedre.111b22a1e848.jpg) Diedre DowningHigh School Math Teacher
  * ![Testimonial Image](https://www.educreations.com/static/focuslab/images/bkg_testimonial_5.5f3fb7ae80dd.jpg)John AdamsHigh School Math Teacher
> The power of Educreations lies in its simplicity. I am able to focus on delivering instruction in a clear and natural fashion.
![](https://www.educreations.com/static/focuslab/images/profile_photo_john.c8b2f4cf8746.jpg) John AdamsHigh School Math Teacher
  * ![Testimonial Image](https://www.educreations.com/static/focuslab/images/bkg_testimonial_6.7ea0e72935ff.jpg)Matt Macfarlane7th-8th Grade History Teacher
> Educreations has helped me to be a better teacher and my students better learners. They come to class more prepared and more excited about their lessons.
![](https://www.educreations.com/static/focuslab/images/profile_photo_matt.fdf96139fef2.jpg) Matt Macfarlane7th-8th Grade History Teacher


# Educreations Benefits
  * ![Globe Icon](https://www.educreations.com/static/focuslab/images/icon_globe_comp.b1e96676983a.svg)
## Teach anything from anywhere.
Explain any concept and instantly share your thoughts with others.
  * ![Tablet Icon](https://www.educreations.com/static/focuslab/images/icon_tablet_comp.48454f0d55d5.svg)
## Enable self-paced learning.
Help students take control of their learning and master each new concept.
  * ![Student Icon](https://www.educreations.com/static/focuslab/images/icon_student_comp.b0eeb70006fc.svg)
## See what students know.
Replay student work to pinpoint misconceptions, and celebrate their successes.
  * ![Clock Icon](https://www.educreations.com/static/focuslab/images/icon_clock.d2bde5362119.svg)
## Save time in class.
Spend more time engaging students one-on-one. Create time for hands-on learning.


# Real Life Examples
  * [![](https://cdn1.educreations.com/static/examples/paul-groves-accuracy-and-precision.png) You need an HTML5 enabled browser to view this video. ](https://www.educreations.com/</lesson/view/paul-groves-accuracy-and-precision/9011084/>)
  * [![](https://cdn1.educreations.com/static/examples/matt-macfarlane-the-bill-of-rights.png) You need an HTML5 enabled browser to view this video. ](https://www.educreations.com/</lesson/view/matt-macfarlane-the-bill-of-rights/2396789/>)
  * [![](https://cdn1.educreations.com/static/examples/brandon-barrette-simplifying-before-solving.png) You need an HTML5 enabled browser to view this video. ](https://www.educreations.com/</lesson/view/brandon-barrette-simplifying-before-solving/6720907/>)
  * [![](https://cdn1.educreations.com/static/examples/joe-driscoll-neuron-parts.png) You need an HTML5 enabled browser to view this video. ](https://www.educreations.com/</lesson/view/joe-driscoll-neuron-parts/289672/>)

by Paul Groves
  2. ![Matt Macfarlane](https://cdn1.educreations.com/static/examples/matt-macfarlane.jpg)

by Matt Macfarlane

### Simplifying Before Solving
by Brandon Barrette
  4. ![Joe Driscoll](https://cdn1.educreations.com/static/examples/joe-driscoll.jpg)
### Neuron Parts
by Joe Driscoll


# Free Download
Educreations is a unique interactive whiteboard and screencasting tool that's simple, powerful, and fun to use. Annotate, animate, and narrate nearly any type of content as you explain any concept.
[Sign Up Now](https://www.educreations.com/</register/>)[Download App](https://www.educreations.com/<http:/apps.apple.com/app/educreations/id478617061?mt=8&pt=665186&ct=about>)

generated_description:
**Educreations Company Overview**

**Founded:** 2010  
**Location:** Palo Alto, California  
**Team Size:** 2 employees  
**Group Partner:** Nan  
**Y Combinator Batch:** IK12  
**Website:** [Educreations.com](https://www.educreations.com)  
**Tags:** Education, E-learning, San Francisco Bay Area

**Mission:**  
Educreations is all about empowering educators and learners by providing a platform to create amazing video lessons and online classes using an iPad. It initially began as a community-driven project encouraging knowledge sharing, and it has evolved into a powerful tool for teachers looking to enhance student engagement. The core aim? To extend the reach of exceptional teaching and dramatically improve student achievement.

**What They Do:**  
Educreations offers a versatile software solution that transforms any iPad or web browser into an interactive, recordable whiteboard. This makes it easy for educators to craft engaging video lessons that students can access anytime, anywhere, on any connected device. The platform supports a seamless replay of lessons, allowing learners to revisit complex concepts at their own pace.

**Key Features:**
- **Capture Your Ideas:** Record your voice and screen, creating dynamic video lessons.
- **Share Instantly:** Publish videos directly to Educreations and share via email, social media, or store them in cloud services like Dropbox.
- **Replay Anytime:** Students can revisit lessons stored safely in the cloud.

**User Testimonials:**  
Educreations has garnered positive feedback from teachers who appreciate its simplicity and efficacy. For instance, a high school chemistry teacher remarked on its straightforwardness in lesson creation, which allows for a focus on conveying knowledge rather than on navigating technical hurdles.

**Benefits:**
- Enable self-paced learning, giving students the autonomy to master concepts on their schedule.
- Observe student progress by reviewing their submissions and addressing misunderstandings.
- Optimize classroom time, allowing educators to engage more deeply with students.

**Conclusion:**  
Educreations is not just an educational tool; it's a catalyst for transforming traditional teaching methodologies into a more dynamic, engaging experience. By leveraging technology, they are on a mission to democratize education, ensuring that great teaching can reach a broader audience. If you're interested in making learning accessible and impactful, Educreations is definitely one to check out!
